Entries.default: "Believe it or not, the bunks here are actually far more comfortable than the tavern."
"Ahh! Please, we're not with the Valera family!"
"Poor Atello's bought up all the old finery he could. As if we can't tell!"
"O-oh. You...aren't renting a bunk here, are you?"
"I'd think you'd want to find lodgings in the Rauatai District."
"This city has so many stairs! Sometimes you have to rest your feet."
